original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close steady, rupee 313.75/314.50 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds were steady at close, dealers said while the spot US dollar closed at 313.75/314.50 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 14.90/15.00 steady from 14.50/75 from opening.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 and a bond maturing on 01.07.2025 have not been quoted. (Colombo/ July10/2023)
